name: Rinne no Lagrange: Kamogawa Days Game & OVA Hybrid Disc
name_original: Rinne no Lagrange: Kamogawa Days Game & OVA Hybrid Disc
description:
Rinne no Lagrange: Kamogawa Days Game & OVA Hybrid Disc is an action game. It came out on 23-08-2013.
Rinne no Lagrange: Kamogawa Days Game & OVA Hybrid Disc is available on PlayStation 3.
